org.sxb.data.redis.connection.jedis

クラス JedisConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisConnectionFactory
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    DisposableBean, InitializingBean, PersistenceExceptionTranslator, RedisConnectionFactory

    public class JedisConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements InitializingBean, DisposableBean, RedisConnectionFactory
    Connection factory creating Jedis based connections.
    作成者:
    Costin Leau, Thomas Darimont, Christoph Strobl

    • コンストラクタの概要

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      JedisConnectionFactory()
      Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance with default settings (default connection pooling, no shard information).
      JedisConnectionFactory(redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig poolConfig)
      Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given pool configuration.
      JedisConnectionFactory(redis.clients.jedis.JedisShardInfo shardInfo)
      Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance.
      JedisConnectionFactory(RedisSentinelConfiguration sentinelConfig)
      Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given JedisPoolConfig applied to JedisSentinelPool.
      JedisConnectionFactory(RedisSentinelConfiguration sentinelConfig, redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig poolConfig)
      Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given JedisPoolConfig applied to JedisSentinelPool.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • JedisConnectionFactory

        public JedisConnectionFactory()
        Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance with default settings (default connection pooling, no shard information).

      • JedisConnectionFactory

        public JedisConnectionFactory(redis.clients.jedis.JedisShardInfo shardInfo)
        Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance. Will override the other connection parameters passed to the factory.
        パラメータ:
        shardInfo - shard information

      • JedisConnectionFactory

        public JedisConnectionFactory(redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig poolConfig)
        Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given pool configuration.
        パラメータ:
        poolConfig - pool configuration

      • JedisConnectionFactory

        public JedisConnectionFactory(RedisSentinelConfiguration sentinelConfig)
        Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given JedisPoolConfig applied to JedisSentinelPool.
        パラメータ:
        sentinelConfig -
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.4

      • JedisConnectionFactory

        public JedisConnectionFactory(RedisSentinelConfiguration sentinelConfig,
                              redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig poolConfig)
        Constructs a new JedisConnectionFactory instance using the given JedisPoolConfig applied to JedisSentinelPool.
        パラメータ:
        sentinelConfig -
        poolConfig - pool configuration. Defaulted to new instance if null.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.4

    • メソッドの詳細

      • afterPropertiesSet

        public void afterPropertiesSet()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: InitializingBean
        Invoked by a BeanFactory after it has set all bean properties supplied (and satisfied BeanFactoryAware and ApplicationContextAware).

        This method allows the bean instance to perform initialization only possible when all bean properties have been set and to throw an exception in the event of misconfiguration.

        定義:
        afterPropertiesSet インタフェース内 InitializingBean

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: DisposableBean
        Invoked by a BeanFactory on destruction of a singleton.
        定義:
        destroy インタフェース内 DisposableBean

      • getConnection

        public JedisConnection getConnection()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: RedisConnectionFactory
        Provides a suitable connection for interacting with Redis.
        定義:
        getConnection インタフェース内 RedisConnectionFactory
        戻り値:
        connection for interacting with Redis.

      • translateExceptionIfPossible

        public DataAccessException translateExceptionIfPossible(java.lang.RuntimeException ex)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: PersistenceExceptionTranslator
        Translate the given runtime exception thrown by a persistence framework to a corresponding exception from Spring's generic org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException hierarchy, if possible.

        Do not translate exceptions that are not understood by this translator: for example, if coming from another persistence framework, or resulting from user code or otherwise unrelated to persistence.

        Of particular importance is the correct translation to DataIntegrityViolationException, for example on constraint violation. Implementations may use Spring JDBC's sophisticated exception translation to provide further information in the event of SQLException as a root cause.

        定義:
        translateExceptionIfPossible インタフェース内 PersistenceExceptionTranslator
        パラメータ:
        ex - a RuntimeException to translate
        戻り値:
        the corresponding DataAccessException (or null if the exception could not be translated, as in this case it may result from user code rather than from an actual persistence problem)
        関連項目:
        org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException, org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLExceptionTranslator

        public java.lang.String getHostName()

        Returns the hostName

        public void setDatabase(int index)
        Sets the index of the database used by this connection factory. Default is 0.
        パラメータ:
        index - database index

      • getConvertPipelineAndTxResults

        public boolean getConvertPipelineAndTxResults()
        Specifies if pipelined results should be converted to the expected data type. If false, results of JedisConnection.closePipeline() and JedisConnection.exec() will be of the type returned by the Jedis driver
        定義:
        getConvertPipelineAndTxResults インタフェース内 RedisConnectionFactory
        戻り値:
        Whether or not to convert pipeline and tx results

      • setConvertPipelineAndTxResults

        public void setConvertPipelineAndTxResults(boolean convertPipelineAndTxResults)
        Specifies if pipelined results should be converted to the expected data type. If false, results of JedisConnection.closePipeline() and JedisConnection.exec() will be of the type returned by the Jedis driver
        パラメータ:
        convertPipelineAndTxResults - Whether or not to convert pipeline and tx results

      • isRedisSentinelAware

        public boolean isRedisSentinelAware()
        戻り値:
        true when RedisSentinelConfiguration is present.
        導入されたバージョン:
        1.4

      • getSentinelConnection

        public RedisSentinelConnection getSentinelConnection()

        定義:
